akn:section.akn:heading: Computation of pay and allowances for month or part of month

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1004. Computation of pay and allowances for month or part of month A member of a uniformed service who is entitled to pay and allowances under this title for a continuous period of less than one month is entitled to his pay and allowances for each day of that period at the rate of 1⁄30 of the monthly amount of his pay and allowances. The thirty-first day of a calendar month may not be excluded from a computation under this section. (Pub. L. 87–649, Sept. 7, 1962, 76 Stat. 490.)
